meanings.sent1: She yanks the rope to close the door quickly.
meanings.sent2: He yanks the weeds out of the garden forcefully.
meanings.sent3: The magician yanks the rabbit out of the hat with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: The strong wind yanks the umbrella from her grip.
meanings.sent5: The child yanks the toy away from his friend in excitement.

meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of the United States.
meanings.sent1: The yanks celebrated Independence Day with fireworks.
meanings.sent2: Many yanks enjoy baseball as their favorite sport.
meanings.sent3: The friendly yanks welcomed the tourists with open arms.
meanings.sent4: The yanks in the movie wore cowboy hats and boots.
meanings.sent5: She met a group of yanks while traveling in New York City.
